summary: On July 16th, The Block presented its APAC Central Bank Digital Currencies - Design, Policy & Implementation webinar before a live audience.
title: The Block Presents: APAC — Central Bank Digital Currencies | Full Webinar
content: On July 16th, The Block presented its APAC Central Bank Digital Currencies - Design, Policy & Implementation webinar before a live audience. This webinar served as a prelude to The Block's central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) whitepaper, set for release in the coming weeks.
Research analyst Ryan Todd was joined by:
Prior to the commencement of the panel, Jupiter Zheng from Hashkey Capital presented the latest developments in CBDC projects across the region.
You can watch the webinar in its entirety along with the accompanying slides below:
